options.name: License Plate Bracket
options.description: Front license plate bracket; Standard in states where required by law

options.name: 3.55 E-Lock Electronic Locking Rear Axle Ratio
3.5L V6 EcoBoost Engine
options.description: 3.5L V6 EcoBoost engine with twin turbos, direct injection, DOHC, 24-valves, variable valve timing, 365 hp @ 5,000 rpm and 420 lb-ft of torque @ 2,500 rpm; 36 gallon fuel tank
options.availability: XL Reg LB 4WD/XL SuperCab 4WD/XL SuperCrew 4WD/XLT 4WD/FX4/Lariat 4WD/King Ranch 4WD/Platinum 4WD

options.name: Non-California Emissions/Non-Cross-Border States Dealer Order For California States Registration
options.description: It is a violation of federal law for a Federal-State dealer to sell a vehicle with code 422 (California-Emissions System), unless the vehicle will be registered in a California-Emissions or Cross-Border State; Federal dealers ordering vehicles with code 422 are required to also use code 93N to attest that the vehicle is being sold/delivered to a customer intending to register the vehicle in a California-Emissions or Cross-Border State

options.name: California Emissions System
options.description: Required on units with GVWR of 8,500 lbs. or less for California, Connecticut, Massachusetts, Maryland, Maine, New Jersey, New York, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Vermont and Washington registration; Optional for Cross-Border States: Arizona, Delaware, Idaho, Nevada, New Hampshire, New Mexico, Ohio, Utah, Virginia and West Virginia

options.name: California Emissions System Not Required
options.description: Control code for units either shipped to California-Emissions States dealers or ordered by California-Emissions States dealers for registration in non-California States locations; In Maine, Rhode Island and Vermont, dealers cannot order vehicles for customers in non-California Emission State locations (except 936 - State Public Service/Emergency Vehicles)

options.name: California Emission Exemption For Public Service/Emergency Vehicles (Fleet)
options.description: This exemption may only apply in certain states; Ordering dealer is responsible for contacting the proper state authorities for clarification on qualifying exempted vehicles for registration; Only available on units sold for authorized public service or emergency service use; Must also use Code 423 when ordering

options.name: 50 State Emissions (Fleet)
options.description: Available on all engines to Commercial and Government Fleet only. Standard on F-150 6.2L Engine (including Raptor).

styles.name: King Ranch 4dr SuperCrew 4WD Styleside 6.5 ft. SB (5.0L 8cyl 6A)
King Ranch 4dr SuperCrew 4WD Styleside 5.5 ft. SB (5.0L 8cyl 6A)
